name.ch: 海洋生物地球化學實驗

notice.en: 1).Classroom：Room 6040, Research Center for Environmental Changes Building, Academia Sinica; 2).TIGP students only.
notice.ch: 1.上課地點：中研院環變大樓6040會議室，2.限TIGP學生

department.ch: 地球系統科學國際研究生博士學位學程
department.en: International Ph.D. Graduate Program for Earth System Science

remark.ch: 1.上課地點：中研院環變大樓6040會議室，2.限TIGP學生
remark.en: 1).Classroom：Room 6040, Research Center for Environmental Changes Building, Academia Sinica; 2).TIGP students only.

goal.ch: 學習在野外工作中收集水文數據和海水樣本的分析與採樣技能，以及海水基本分析化學的方法。
goal.en: To learn the analytical and sampling skills in field work for the collection of hydrographic data and seawater samples and the basic analytical chemistry of seawater.

outline.ch: 教授測定海水基本水文特性的核心分析技術。
outline.en: To teach the essential analytical techniques in the determination of fundamental hydrographic properties of seawater.

textbook.ch: A Manual of Chemical and Biological Methods for Seawater Analysis, Parsons
textbook.en: A Manual of Chemical and Biological Methods for Seawater Analysis, Parsons

ch.competencies: 進階數理及專業知識能力
觀測模擬及分析推理能力
國際視野與語文溝通能力
專業倫理及服務學習之能力
電腦及程式語言應用能力

en.competencies: Advanced mathematical and professional knowledge and ability
Observation simulation and analysis of reasoning ability
International perspective and language communication skills

ch: 學院:限地科學院。系所:限地球系統科學國際研究生博士學位學程。
en: Faculty:College of Earth Sciences only.Department:International Ph.D. Graduate Program for Earth System Science only.
